name: MIR COIN
description: MIR COIN (MIR) is a cryptocurrency. Users are able to generate MIR through the process of mining. MIR COIN has a current supply of 1,300,000,000 with 620,041,495 in circulation. The last known price of MIR COIN is $0.003117 USD and is down -1.88% over the last 24 hours. It is currently trading on 8 active market(s) with $2,350,569.053 traded over the last 24 hours. More information can be found at http://www.mircoin.io/.
